articles.description: Follow score and live text updates as Scotland host England at Murrayfield, Edinburgh.
articles.title: Scotland vs England LIVE: Six Nations 2026 rugby kick-off time, lineups, score and text updates from Murrayfield

articles.description: Follow build-up to seven FA Cup fourth-round games on Saturday, starting with Burton Albion against West Ham United.
articles.title: FA Cup LIVE: Build-up, team news, scores and live text updates from the fourth round of the FA Cup

articles.description: Follow live text, BBC TV coverage, radio commentary, reaction and updates from the Winter Olympics in Milan-Cortina.
articles.title: Winter Olympics 2026 LIVE: Day eight - watch BBC - medals, results, TV stream & updates from Milan-Cortina

articles.description: Ireland survive a major scare from Italy to claim their first win in this year's Six Nations and deny the Azzurri a first championship victory in Dublin.
articles.title: Ireland 20-13 Italy: Hosts survive major scare to claim first Six Nations win

articles.description: A much-changed Manchester City survive a couple of big scares and an injury setback to see off League Two Salford City in the FA Cup fourth round.
articles.title: Manchester City 2-0 Salford City: Marc Guehi scores first Man City goal in victory

articles.description: Listen to Sportsound and follow live text coverage of Saturday's Scottish football, including three Premiership fixtures.
articles.title: Saturday's Scottish football - radio & text

articles.description: League One side Mansfield Town come from behind to beat Premier League strugglers Burnley and reach the fifth round of the FA Cup for the first time since 1975.
articles.title: FA Cup: Burnley 1-2 Mansfield Town

articles.description: England wobble again but get their T20 World Cup campaign back on track with a five-wicket win over Scotland, leaving the Scots on the brink of an early exit.
articles.title: T20 World Cup: England beat Scotland to put campaign back on track

articles.description: Great Britain's women curlers kickstart their campaign with a superb first victory of the 2026 Winter Olympics, beating medal contenders Canada 7-6.
articles.title: Winter Olympics 2026: GB women spring shock to beat world champions Canada

articles.description: In-form Crysencio Summerville rescues West Ham in extra time as they avoid an FA Cup shock at League One Burton.
articles.title: Burton Albion 0-1 West Ham United (aet): Crysencio Summerville scores in FA Cup
